name: Memory of Azov (Ariel Martinez)
description:
Memory of Azov is a third person adventure inspired by Luigi's Mansion, in which we carry a flashlight instead of a vacuum cleaner.

The game takes place at the Winter Palace of Saint Petersburg, in Russia. After the fall of the Romanov family, the palace has been abandoned and is still under the curse of Rasputin; that's why it's full of ghosts. It also preserves all the treasures of the family, including several Fabergé eggs. Niko, our protagonist, believes that she’s the legitimate heir of one of these eggs, the 'Memory of Azov', and that is why she enters the haunted palace to recover it.

Controls

To play this game you need a controller.  We will detail the Xbox controller buttons, but it works with a PS controller as well. The button mapping is the same (Xbox: A button --> PS: X button)

Left Joystick - to move the character

Right Joystick - to aim/move the flashlight

A - action button (examine objects, open doors, etc.)

Y - switch flashlight color

Start button - pause the game

LB or RB - charge the flash. Hold to charge it and then release when it is at maximum capacity.

Made with my friend:

#Jerometa

Memory of Azov was a final student project for our third year project in the Design and Production of Video Games career.

You have to install Unity to play Memory of Azov. After that, you only need to execute the .exe to start playing!

We hope you enjoy the game!
